titleStmt.title: The recantation of Cornelius O'Donnell, prior of Trim as it was by him solemnly deliver'd in the church of Trim (renouncing the errors of the Roman Church) upon Sunday Aug. 14, together with the motives inducing him thereunto.
titleStmt.author: O'Donnell, Cornelius.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, broken type, and print show-through, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
